hanzi-su-wiki:
貸

Значения

Давать взаймы (в долг)

Мнемоника

  • Ссужать деньги 貝 взамен 代 чего-либо, т.е. под залог.

  • "Вместо 代 него, я вам буду давать взаймы деньги."

Варианты

贷
purpleculture_pinyin:
dài
to lend on interest; to borrow; a loan; leniency; to make excuses; to pardon; to forgive
давать ссуду под проценты; одалживать; заем; снисходительность; оправдываться; помиловать; простить

purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 贷)
Pictophonetic: 代 indicates the sound; 貝 (money) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 貸款 [ dài kuǎn ]: a loan; Classifiers: 笔 ; to provide a loan (e.g. bank); to raise a loan (from e.g. a bank)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 代 [ dài ] era, generation; to substitute for, to replace
    • 貝 [ bèi ] sea shell; money, currency
heisig_chinese_memo: In order for the bank to give you a loan, you need to put up some sort of collateral as a substitute for the money.
heisig_constituent: lend, substitute, person, arrow, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
koohiiStory1: In order for the bank to lend you money, you need to put up some sort of collateral as a substitute for the money.
koohiiStory2: The poor substitute teacher asks the class to lend him some money for the bus fare home.
jp_example_words:
貸し(かし): loan, lending
貸し出し(かしだし): lending, loaning
貸間(かしま): room to let
貸家(かしや): house for rent
貸す(かす): lend
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You substitute some shellfish for collateral so your friend will lend you some money. Normally he would ask for something more valuable, but you’ve convinced him to substitute these shellfish for what he would normally take as collateral when lending to people.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: "Shellfish used to be money! People used to lend them to each other all the time!" you say to your friend. "Hmm... okay, I guess so," they say skeptically.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You want your friend to lend you some money so you can buy yourself a car (か). You need money and a car a lot more than you need this pile of shellfish, so you’re happy to put them up as collateral for the loan.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine yourself in this new car that you got with the money your friend lent you. Hear the roar of the engine and feel the wind in your hair.
Ru_Radicals: 化 (превращаться), ハ, 弋 (стрела с бечевой), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Ru_trainchinese: dài: (сущ/глаг) кредит; брать взаймы, давать взаймы; уклоняться (от ответственности)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: in exchange (代) for the shellfish (貝) you lend
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A bank can substitute for shells (money) your contractual promise to pay them back with interest. This is called a loan.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " Bei " to "On behalf of " sound. The original meaning is to give. "Shuowen": "Loan, Shiye. Congbei, Daisheng." Duan Note: "It is said that I give people, I call loans." Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "The 16th Year of Wengong": "Song's son Baoli was a gift to the Chinese, and Song was hungry. He exhausted his millet and loaned it." "Laozi. Chapter 41": "The husband is only the way, and good loans are made."

" Loan " means borrowing or borrowing. "Guang Ya. Interpretation II: "Lending, borrowing." An example of borrowing is "Zhuangzi. "Foreign Objects": "Zhuang Zhou's family was poor, so he went to loan millet to Jianhehou." "Historical Records. The Biographies of Pingjin Houzhu's Father: "The family is poor, and there is no income from false loans. Traveling north to Yan, Zhao, and Zhongshan, they can't be met with graciousness, and they are very difficult for the guests." The example borrowed is "Guan Zi. Kudu": "Those who have no food give them Chen, those who have no seeds lend new things." "Loyalty": "I would rather pay tens of millions to see the dead, instead of giving someone a money; instead of accumulating millet and decay, instead of bearing a loan from someone."

" Loan " means relief or relief. Such as "Han Shu. "Xue Xuan Zhu Bo Biography": "However, I also give up, and sometimes there are big loans, and the lower officials use this as their best." Yan Shigu's note: "Loans, it is said that lenient leave is also under." "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "Wang Weier and Liu Fu Chuan": "Lending should be widened, so that there can be rehabilitated." Another example is the idiom "Severely punish not lending."

After " loaning ", he also expressed shirk. For example, in the Qing Dynasty, Lin Zexu's "Replay Inspection to Prevent Back to Empty Grain Boats": "It is the responsibility of the governors to pass the place where the watercraft passes."
humanum_short_description_en: From " Bei " to " Dai " sound. The original meaning is to give.
humanum_full_description:
從「貝」，「代」聲。本義是施予。《說文》：「貸，施也。从貝，代聲。」段注：「謂我施人曰貸也。」如《左傳．文公十六年》：「宋公子鮑禮於國人，宋饑，竭其粟而貸之。」《老子．第四十一章》：「夫唯道，善貸且成。」

　　「貸」表示借、借貸。《廣雅．釋詁二》：「貸，借也。」借入的例子如《莊子．外物》：「莊周家貧，故往貸粟於監河侯。」《史記．平津侯主父列傳》：「家貧，假貸無所得，迺北游燕、趙、中山，皆莫能厚遇，為客甚困。」借出的例子如《管子．揆度》：「無食者予之陳，無種者貸之新。」《潛夫論．忠貴》：「寧見朽貫千萬，而不忍賜人一錢；寧積粟腐倉，而不忍貸人一斗。」

　　「貸」表示減免、寬免。如《漢書．薛宣朱博傳》：「然亦縱舍，時有大貸，下吏以此為盡力。」顏師古注：「貸，謂寬假於下也。」《三國志．魏書．王衛二劉傅傳》：「宜加寬貸，使有以自新。」又如成語「嚴懲不貸」。

　　「貸」後還表示推卸。如清代林則徐〈覆奏稽查防範回空糧船折〉：「其漕船經過地方，各督撫亦屬責無旁貸。」

從「 貝 」，「 代 」聲。本義是施予。《說文》：「貸，施也。从貝，代聲。」段注：「謂我施人曰貸也。」如《左傳．文公十六年》：「宋公子鮑禮於國人，宋饑，竭其粟而貸之。」《老子．第四十一章》：「夫唯道，善貸且成。」 「 貸 」表示借、借貸。《廣雅．釋詁二》：「貸，借也。」借入的例子如《莊子．外物》：「莊周家貧，故往貸粟於監河侯。」《史記．平津侯主父列傳》：「家貧，假貸無所得，迺北游燕、趙、中山，皆莫能厚遇，為客甚困。」借出的例子如《管子．揆度》：「無食者予之陳，無種者貸之新。」《潛夫論．忠貴》：「寧見朽貫千萬，而不忍賜人一錢；寧積粟腐倉，而不忍貸人一斗。」 「 貸 」表示減免、寬免。如《漢書．薛宣朱博傳》：「然亦縱舍，時有大貸，下吏以此為盡力。」顏師古注：「貸，謂寬假於下也。」《三國志．魏書．王衛二劉傅傳》：「宜加寬貸，使有以自新。」又如成語「嚴懲不貸」。 「 貸 」後還表示推卸。如清代林則徐〈覆奏稽查防範回空糧船折〉：「其漕船經過地方，各督撫亦屬責無旁貸。」

"The 16th Year of Wengong": "Song's son Baoli was a gift to the Chinese, and Song was hungry. He exhausted his millet and loaned it." "Laozi. Chapter 41": "The husband is only the way, and good loans are made." " Loan" means borrowing or borrowing. "Guang Ya. Interpretation II: "Lending, borrowing." An example of borrowing is "Zhuangzi. "Foreign Objects": "Zhuang Zhou's family was poor, so he went to loan millet to Jianhehou." "Historical Records. 貸字的基本解释

貸
dài

貸
tè
均见“贷”。

貸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dài］
［《廣韻》他代切，去代，透。］
“贷1”的繁体字。
(1)施与；给予。
(2)借入。
(3)借出。
(4)指贷款。
(5)赦免，宽恕。
(6)推卸。
[②]［tè］
［《集韻》惕得切，入德，透。］
“贷2”的繁体字。
通“忒”。差错。

貸字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　貸； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页1206第22
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】?他代切，音態。【說文】施也。【廣雅】予也。【玉篇】假也，借盈也，以物與人更還其主也。【周禮·地官·泉府】凡民之貸者，與其有司，辨而授之。【左傳·文十四年】盡其家貸於公，有司以繼。　又【集韻】惕得切，音慝。本作貣。【五經文字】貸，或相承借爲貣字。【唐韻正】乞貸之貸爲入聲，出貸與人之貸爲去聲。【禮·月令】命太史守典奉法，司天日月星辰之行，宿離不貸。【註】宿，猶止也。離，猶行也。言占?躔次進退之度數不差忒也。【音義】吐得反。又音二。【又】季夏，命婦官染采，黼黻文章，必以法故，無或差貸。【註】言所染五色，如其舊法不攺易也。【音義】他得反。又音二。　又【集韻】【韻會】?敵德切，音特。義同。

dài
вм. 贷

貸

Значения

Давать взаймы (в долг)

Мнемоника

  • Ссужать деньги 貝 взамен 代 чего-либо, т.е. под залог.

  • "Вместо 代 него, я вам буду давать взаймы деньги."

Варианты

贷

Radicals: 代, 貝  (substitute, shellfish)
Meaning Mnemonic
You substitute some shellfish for collateral so your friend will lend you some money. Normally he would ask for something more valuable, but you’ve convinced him to substitute these shellfish for what he would normally take as collateral when lending to people.
"Shellfish used to be money! People used to lend them to each other all the time!" you say to your friend. "Hmm... okay, I guess so," they say skeptically.
Reading Mnemonic
You want your friend to lend you some money so you can buy yourself a car (か). You need money and a car a lot more than you need this pile of shellfish, so you’re happy to put them up as collateral for the loan.
Imagine yourself in this new car that you got with the money your friend lent you. Hear the roar of the engine and feel the wind in your hair.

化 (превращаться), ハ, 弋 (стрела с бечевой), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
